Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Building
Hotel
public class Hotel
extends Building
This is a Hotel Program which can manage and operate certain elements of a hotel
Since:
1.0

      public Hotel()

    • Hotel

      public Hotel​(java.lang.String name, Person[] Owners, int yearofbuilt, int numfloors, double rate)
      This Constructs a new Hotel.
      Parameters:
      name - takes a string for the name of the hotel
      Owners - Takes a list of Owners in an array setup
      yearofbuilt - takes the year that this hotel as a building was built
      numfloors - takes the number of floors this building has
      rate - takes the rating of the establishment

      numfloors - takes the number of floors this building has

    • reserve

      public int reserve​(int roomNumber, java.sql.Date sDate, java.sql.Date eDate, Person guest)
      Checks if these dates can be reserved for this specific room.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - takes an int for the room number
      sDate - Takes a Date ovbject for the starting date
      eDate - Takes a Date ovbject for the leaving date
      guest - Takes the Person Object of the person reserving room or person who will be staying in room
      Returns:
      returns reservation number.

    • cancel

      public boolean cancel​(int reserveNumber)
      Cancels a reservation searches through all reservations to find reservation
      Parameters:
      reserveNumber - takes an int for reservation number
      Returns:
      returns true if successfully cancelled else false.
